website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an affordable credit card reader that works with a desktop, this is a great option. Just keep in mind it isn't the highest quality.
pros: Fully programmable to work with Windows or Macs
No need to download or install any software
cons: This reader also does not encrypt data

customer_reviews.title: Works with mindbody....
customer_reviews.text: Don't let mindbody charge you a ton of money for a credit card swiper. We've now been using this for months and it was a fraction of what mindbody wanted to charge us for one. It's easy to use, you seriously just plug it in. The light on the swiper turns green and it's ready to go! Simple as that!
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I use MindBody Online for my business. My old card reader died, so I ordered this one as a replacement. All I had to do was plug it into my Mac and this reader was ready to go. It works fine, and was a great buy. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Shupe

customer_reviews.title: ... our business for some while now and it's been great. Just plug and play
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this at our business for some while now and it's been great. Just plug and play, very simple. It's been 100% dependable. No typing in any info, no expensive equipment. I'm amazed how cheap it was and how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: chrisT

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We've been using this to process credit cards in our office and so far it's held up. It was a little tricky to set up but nothing too bad. Just click through some options and you should be able to figure everything out. It may have taken the computer a bit to correctly identify the device too. Overall, it's a great product for the price. Hopefully it will last for years. If problems arise I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: RSCG

customer_reviews.title: Only works a few times then nothing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dance studio to save time inputting credit card info into our registration software. It worked great a handful of times (really... less than 10) and now it won't read anything even though it's plugged in and the green light is on. Returning and spending a bit more on quality next time around.
customer_reviews.author: Christina King

customer_reviews.title: Basic and works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Simply plug and play. No software provided. Displays scanned input, reading accuracy is not consistent. Okay for non critical applications. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Works with MindBody!
customer_reviews.text: Effortless setup for MindBody. With a client tab open in MindBody business web, just open the billing information tab. Swipe a card, and it instantly updates the card information on file. Super easy, and so much cheaper than the same-over priced device sold from MindBody directly.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great, if you aren't in a rush.
customer_reviews.text: Unit is not designed for a fast paced POS environment. Unit would accept a swipe, then the light would go out, then it would reconnect to the computer and the light would come back on again. Replaced with a more expensive version and haven't heard another complaint since.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it daily without problems for the past 3 years, what else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Great Reader, Great Price, Arrived In Two Days (Prime)
customer_reviews.text: This is the second reader I have purchased from 2xhome. These readers are great, inexpensive, and integrate flawlessly with our system. I was using an older reader with our second system which took about three seconds to read in all three tracks from the card, the POSMATE reader is much faster and reads all three tracks in about a 1/2 second. Great price, great shipping speed, no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Paul David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is plug and play and works without issue or needing drivers on both Linux and MacOS.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work all the time. It has a mind of it’s own.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Building a register application for my Model Railroad club, I will be using an API to interact with the scanner and charge customers automatically. This scanner works beautifully and is priced right.
customer_reviews.author: George Sharp Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works with MindBody Online! And is a quarter of the cost of theirs. #KC5Stars
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty easy to use as it just emulates keyboard input
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to find the software to program it with, which is only available on Windows. Once you get it working, it's pretty easy to use as it just emulates keyboard input. Build quality is pretty cheap. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Works great. no issues
customer_reviews.text: Works great. no issues. Nice to be able to plug/unplug as I need it, doesn't go wonky if not left plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm... we couldn't get it to work on our system QB w/mac
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Merly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome card reader!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this card reader for business, the installation was so easy and quick I could use it instantly it helped me to read customer's debit/credit cards in no time. I have been using this card reader almost two months, and got no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Aquarius512

customer_reviews.title: Better have a back up plan.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 6 credit cards, then stopped working. Tried the support website that came with the item, does not exist. Went online and found another nonexistent support website. Sent email to seller and after 10 day no response I returned the swiper. Good luck to the rest of you.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Quite working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and use. It was working great for what I needed, but it quit working only after using for four months.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Mommy

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to use with my laptop, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my laptop, but it's hit or miss- sometimes it reads the cards, other times it doesn't. In the world of growing mobile technology, stick to using a square reader on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McManus

customer_reviews.title: Quickbooks Online
customer_reviews.text: Using this for Quickbooks Online. Works perfectly. I was worried that a browser app would have trouble working with it but it's easy. And no driver needed--plug in and you're ready to swipe.
customer_reviews.author: Andrej P. Kyselica

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Stops working.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one and it stopped working after 3 months. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reader for html based web apps
customer_reviews.text: We use this for scanning cards into a web app. Installs with no drivers. jQuery Cardswipe library makes it parse into appropriate fields on the webpage. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I wouldn’t have bought this
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. It Wouldn’t even work on either of my computers. I Even downloaded the link posted in reviews thinking it would read the cards.. nope.
customer_reviews.author: Catilyn mccliment

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and works well with windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: kmg

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: It scrambles card numbers, we have to swipe each card 4 or 5 times in order for it to work. We bought it a while before we actually started using it so by the time we realized it didn't work, the "return window had closed." We bought a piece of crap that didn't work then couldn't return it...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I disagree with another reviewer...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this is FIRST rate. The shipping was immediate and I am completely happy with this purchase. I would like to experiment with programming it but do not know where to access the software to do so. The link I found in another part of this listing takes one nowhere. Even so, this works right out of the box and exactly as stated. I would buy from this seller again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: CatBatMan®

customer_reviews.title: Great no issues
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for my business for over a month now. No issues. Great!
customer_reviews.author: MAJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with Quickbooks to process credit cards. We take several transactions a day on 2 swipers.
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: really cheap
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad and it Didn't come with instructions, software or Cd to download with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Fanfan

customer_reviews.title: Works with Dell & XCharge
customer_reviews.text: I just plugged it into the USB port and it worked right away! I use it with a Dell desktop and XCharge.
customer_reviews.author: HaleyPM

customer_reviews.title: the reader doesn't work at all doesn't come with any ...
customer_reviews.text: the reader doesn't work at all doesn't come with any instruction or software and i can't get it to work on a mac at all. I have been trying to figure it out for a week. boo!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Reads credit card info directly into my QuickBooks online revieve CC payment page
customer_reviews.author: Jonnycsd

customer_reviews.title: Simple & easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: this product works great once I figured a couple initial glitches with the software I was trying to use it with. Simple plug and play design - works riht out of the box with no special software, if using certain POS software, you might need to do some configuring within the application to get it to work right.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ceresnak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. No issues and was easy to install - plug and play
customer_reviews.author: Buzzweiser

customer_reviews.title: Works great, will buy again. Price performance wise, this thing rocks.Reads every swipe card I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, will buy again. Price performance wise, this rocks. Will buy again. BTW this is not a PCI compliant device. Not meant to read the new chip cards.
customer_reviews.author: Thorne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worked good.
customer_reviews.text: For the inexpensive investment it worked. Could have come with a couple of velcro squares to attach to device. That would have earned it another star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit to read credit cards into our company's custom FileMaker based POS system. There was a small hiccup when I connected it to my MacBook, though. OS X Mavericks reported that the keyboard was not recognized. I contacted the seller, who told me that he tested it on his new MacBook, and that it worked fine after dismissing the error message. I tried the same thing, and sure enough, I was able to obtain the information from swiped cards. This unit will be a useful addition to our system.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Morse

customer_reviews.title: but it would be nice if it did as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does not read driver's license as advertised. Compact size is a plus, but it would be nice if it did as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: kevin seiple

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: love this credit card reader it eve enters in the person name which my old one wouldn't do!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight little item that I use at my yoga studio with Mind Body Online Software. It immediately integrated, no problem. Sometimes it takes a few swipes to get the card to read but overall I am very happy with it. Not super high quality but the price is right and it is a good solution to take cards and not spend a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: The swiper worked really well for the first 3 or ...
customer_reviews.text: The swiper worked really well for the first 3 or 4 months and then would only sporadically work and then not at all. I ended up buying another from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza Gallon

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly, and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in. Windows 7 Home Edition recognized it and installed the driver. Opened Notepad, grabbed a card and swiped it, and BAM! Unencrypted data spits right out. Tried credit cards, drivers license, Starbucks card, The reader read them all, no problem. For my purposes, this reader works perfectly and was a huge bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Stop Swinging the Bat, Wendy

customer_reviews.title: PROGRAMMING WOES
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use this card reader. It is too...difficult to program.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  M.  Niblack

customer_reviews.title: Works out of the box
customer_reviews.text: - Works out of the box, nothing to install - A little flimsy, but time will tell if it is a good product overall - For now 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Sequeira

customer_reviews.title: No instructions included. Look at top comment
customer_reviews.text: Not 5 stars because it is a bit hard to set up. You are given just the device with no instructions. Only reason I knew how to set up was due to the top comment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great despite cheap price I wouldn't spend money on an ...
customer_reviews.text: works great despite cheap price I wouldn't spend money on an expensive one after buying this one and it working so well

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Quickbooks 2016
customer_reviews.text: Works great with QuickBooks 2016. Very happy customer. (HP Pavilion, Windows 7 I5 core)

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Mini Credit Card Tracker
customer_reviews.text: Not had much of a chance to test this yet. Seems serviceable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and setup was a breeze... Works as advertised!

customer_reviews.title: this works great in our office to receive payments
customer_reviews.text: So far, this works great in our office to receive payments. I wish it had a way to connect to the monitor. Perhaps, I'll look for an attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Neely Penn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent MSR100, three track reader. Worked perfectly out of the box with my MacOSX10.9+, Linux/Ubuntu12.04,14.04. Python PyUSB interfaced cleanly.

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive...
customer_reviews.text: The swiper works and it doesn't work... It seems recently it is working less than before. :/
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Installed this on a front desk computer in a dentist ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on a front desk computer in a dentist office. It integrated perfectly with Eaglesoft and required no configuration. Just plug and go.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Ok but weak construction. Will probably pay a little more for a better constructed one when it fails.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, the cable is a little brittle and is starting to come out of the case. I can see the internal wires so it's days are probably numbered.
customer_reviews.author: Verta

customer_reviews.title: POS stay away
customer_reviews.text: Second reader to stop working after incredibly minimal use, just green light blinking and non-scanning. What a waste of $40....

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Does not read the card number, have to manually enter the card number.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it worked for the first three days and then just stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Rockland U.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works flawlessly and worked with in seconds of plugging it in.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly made, lasted less than one year, after being used approximately 4 times a week, for less than a year. Do not buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return it
customer_reviews.text: I bought three - they came in a box with no instructions, guidance. Tried to look up directions for programming them... to no avail. They display the information in one spot - so you have to cut/paste to the different tabs. Not really saving much time. Should have purchased the more expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 4 swipes and broke. Does not read cards correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: waited to write a review for a few weeks! product works just as described. my pc runs on windomws 10, purchased another product and had to return because it did NOT work with wondows 10. simple to use USB plug and play. i use with my business payment platform "fareharbor" and this makes it quicker to now swipe and the info is input for me vs. manually typing all the info per purhase. little tip: i used the "no hole" wall hanging command strips to mount this to my pc monitor and it works great! keeps it off my desk and out of the way .
customer_reviews.author: tifani stegehuis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly as it says. Plug it in, and it works!
customer_reviews.author: BMAllen, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to do. We have four of them and use them daily.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Plugs right in. No software needed. Open your app ( I use notepad), slide card, and it puts all the text from card in the open active app.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This little USB card reader does the job it is intended to do. Plugs in and worked right away. Works flawlessly with our software to process credit cards. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Then I bought these works great.
customer_reviews.text: Had some other ones and didn't work. Then I bought these works great.

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine with my Mac Pro OS 1010
customer_reviews.text: Works well, no need for any special drivers or software. It worked fine with my Mac Pro OS 1010.1.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work after a month.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it in February and the scanner already doesn’t work.

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should.
customer_reviews.text: Great Reader. Arrived Fast, easy to setup (really there is no setup, just plug and play). And it works with the software I needed it to. Looks good.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This device works great with our point of sale. Just plug in to the computer and swipe credit card to complete the sale.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: simple and straightforward. when you swipe, the magnetic card information is read in as a keyboard input.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome product
customer_reviews.text: i love the product on how it works for my business i can finally process cards with this card swipe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service!! Got the product in time and it works like it says. Recommend 100% Just plug and play, easy as that!! Works perfectly with my POS, I'm a really happy customer.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item works very well. It reads any magnetic card. Note only reading not writing.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: This thing just works, I tested it on Mac, Linux and Windows. Each time it showed up and worked flawlessly. No complaints reads the data fine and puts it into my web application. Can't ask for much more.

customer_reviews.text: How do I use it on my Mac keep saying device not found

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice for a Credit Card Swipe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Card Swipe. Mounted to the side of PC Monitor. It works great, great price and ships fast. It's a keeper !!!
customer_reviews.author: John Potts

customer_reviews.title: Plug & Use
customer_reviews.text: We use these at numerous locations on a variety PCs with different versions of Windows. Never had a problem with them. Couldn't be easier.
customer_reviews.author: cools stuff inc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works just perfectly. I just wish it had a way to attach it to the wall or desk or something. But it's extremely simple to use and does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steph W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Reader
customer_reviews.text: This reader in the default Keyboard interface which is exactly what I needed for my Virtual Terminal's reader. Excellent shipment time.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine to read magnetic strip cards. I was buying card readers from the company that supplies my cards for clients and they were charging me $100 per reader. Shame on me for not looking into getting a generic reader for much much less. It works just as advertised, haven't had too many issues with bad reads. I do wish it came with some self adhesive to mount the readers, but its not a big deal, just would have been more convenient. I'll be picking up a few more and replacing any future units that poop out with these!
customer_reviews.author: Wirebender06

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed and you cant beat two-day shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed and you cant beat two-day shipping with Amazon Prime, product exceeded my expectations and arrived so fast! This little swiper is so handy, just plug it in and it works (on my Windows 7 PC), its that simple! Thanks a million!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rumorz Boutique

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months with light usage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this scanner in January of this year and have used it lightly over the period scanning < 10000 cards, however, the scanner now refuses to work when plugged into the laptop, the green light just keeps blinking now, tried to contact the seller for a recourse and they don't even reply, Do not buy this one, buy something else which at-least lasts a full year
customer_reviews.author: Keith D

customer_reviews.title: Great for Loyalty Cards
customer_reviews.text: I needed another card swiper for a trade show for a booth that I'm running and this card swiper is great for either point-of-sale transaction processing or for loyalty cards. One thing to note is that this card swiper isn't a CHIP compatible reader--so going forward in the future we'll only be using this reader to swipe our loyalty cards, and not for transaction processing.
customer_reviews.author: Team Chang

customer_reviews.title: Helped me easily find a gift card lost in a pile of spent gift cards
customer_reviews.text: I lost a gift card with a significant amount of $$$ on it. It was in a pile of other gift cards that were long sent. Using this card swiper and a little bit of script know how I turned an needle in a haystack dilemma into a much more manageable task. Paid for itself many times over that day.
customer_reviews.author: The Cashback Kid

customer_reviews.title: If you need just a plain USB card reader that works, but has no bells and whistles.  Buy this unit.

product_meta.title: 2xhome - POSMATE - USB Mini Credit Card 3 Track Hi Lo Co Magnetic Reader Swiper for POS System Cashier Registry Cash Register Quickbook
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1Adesso 2xhome - POSMATE - USB Mini Credit Card 3 Track Hi Lo Co Magnetic Reader Swiper for POS System Cashier Registry Cash Register Quickbook
feature_bullets: Fully PROGRAMMABLE card reader. Work with WINS or MAC all version!
1,2, 3 TRACKS applicable and ISO, ANSI and AAMVA compatible including credit card, gift cards, drivers license, ATMs, and etc
USB interface - Simply plug and play. NO installation required.
PLEASE CHECK: if your system require encrypted reader, this is NOT suitable for you!!!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars279 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
